data.text:
@nzherald Labour policies are responsible for;
38,000 businesses closed
52,000+ adverse reactions to vax
Up to 147 deaths due to vax
Numerous job losses
Numerous suicides
Division in NZ
Huge long term social effect of fear on children
NZ debt to gdp rising from 18% to 47% in “22
@nzherald Deliberately do the wrong thing - both of them - then whine about people not liking it? Hmm
@nzherald The lawyer couple had their names dragged thru the mud and by contrast caused zero damage with their border breach. Why the inconsistency?
@nzherald Tough luck lady.  Suck it up.  Do the rite thing and you’d have nothing to bitch about
@BlackSm75396010 @nzherald Yay glad to see more forthright views on Twitter….
